title: Why choose Rentup?
text: Well... At Rentup we show the best properties available. Also, we make it sooo easy for you. You can schedule a visit, reserve a property and even rent it without having to see it. But how?

title: Easy to rent
text: When you register at Rentup, we ask our you to complete a prequalification form. The owner tell us what are the minimun requirements for renting their properties. So, when you find a property you like and you meet the requirements, you can reserve it online.

title: Easy to manage
text: You can manage visits, properties and even rents in my-area section. When a rent is created, you'll have all the information about it in your area, you can even pay bills throught our platform. CAN YOU BELIEVE IT?
